translation.en: [woman 1 in Spanish] I'm always dreaming of Puerto Rico.
translation.zh: 我总是梦见波多黎各

translation.en: I have dreamed of the town I lived in with my friends.
translation.zh: 我会梦见我和朋友们居住的城镇

translation.en: [woman 2 in Spanish] In Puerto Rico, I have happiness. I have stability.
translation.zh: 在波多黎各 我拥有幸福 拥有稳定

translation.en: [woman 3 in Spanish] Life in Puerto Rico was beautiful, but also difficult.
translation.zh: 在波多黎各的生活既美好又艰辛

translation.en: But let me tell you, the food, the people...
translation.zh: 但我必须说的是 那里的食物、人民…

translation.en: One day, I'll go back to my island.
translation.zh: 总有一天我会回到我的岛上

translation.en: [woman 3] She stormed in like a monster,
translation.zh: 它像一个猛兽般袭来

translation.en: completely devastating Puerto Rico.
translation.zh: 彻底摧毁了波多黎各

translation.en: -[in Spanish] Is it open? -[woman] Yes, the door is open.
translation.zh: 门开着吗？ 对 开着的

translation.en: [Nilda] After the hurricane passed, everything was destroyed.
translation.zh: 飓风过境之后 一切都被摧毁

translation.en: It didn't look like the same island.
translation.zh: 整座岛屿面目全非

translation.en: [woman 3] The first thing that failed was the communications system.
translation.zh: 首先中断的是通讯系统

translation.en: There was no cell reception, no ATMs, no bank system.
translation.zh: 手机信号 自动提款机 银行系统全无

translation.en: It didn't matter if you had money or not.
translation.zh: 不管你有钱没钱都一样

translation.en: The government said, "Prepare yourselves for two weeks."
translation.zh: 政府说：“自行做好两个星期的准备”

translation.en: Everyone prepared. Most of the people did. I did too.
translation.zh: 人人都做了准备 大部分人有 我也有

translation.en: But I never thought that, even two weeks in, it'd still be chaos.
translation.zh: 但我未曾想过 两周后仍会一片混乱

translation.en: [woman 2] I had never seen Puerto Rico like that.
translation.zh: 我从来没有看过这样的波多黎各

translation.en: You'd go out on the streets,
translation.zh: 走上街头

translation.en: and you would see all the trees without any leaves,
translation.zh: 你会看到所有树木都光秃秃的

translation.en: destroyed houses, people crying and yelling outside.
translation.zh: 房子被摧毁 人们在外面嚎哭喊叫

translation.en: By 5:00 or 6:00 p.m., night would come,
translation.zh: 下午五六点左右 夜幕降临

translation.en: and it was very dark. Too dark.
translation.zh: 天色非常黑 黑得不像话

translation.en: So we gathered and slept in one room together, all of us,
translation.zh: 于是我们聚在一起 所有人睡一间屋

translation.en: to be safe.
translation.zh: 以保障安全

translation.en: [Glenda] Half of my house was exposed.
translation.zh: 我家房子有一半暴露在外

translation.en: And then the rats and the snakes started to turn up,
translation.zh: 然后开始有老鼠和蛇出没

translation.en: like they were fighting over who would be the last one to survive.
translation.zh: 好像它们在比拼 看谁会幸存到最后

translation.en: FEMA arrived at my house two months later.
translation.zh: 联邦应急管理署在两个月后到访我家

translation.en: They told me, "You cannot live here."
translation.zh: 他们告诉我：“你不能住在这里”

translation.en: [Nilda] I didn't want to leave.
translation.zh: 我不想离开

translation.en: I had my dog, Chico.
translation.zh: 这里有我的爱狗奇科

translation.en: I had my best friend.
translation.zh: 有我最好的朋友

translation.en: [Kenia] Easy.
translation.zh: 别难过了

translation.en: [Nilda] But I had no choice. Things had to get better.
translation.zh: 但我没有选择 情况必须要有所改善

translation.en: But I was prepared to come here.
translation.zh: 我是做好了准备来到这里的

translation.en: [reporter in English] Ten and a half months since Hurricane Maria devastated Puerto Rico,
translation.zh: 飓风玛利亚肆虐波多黎各十个半月后

translation.en: nearly half the island still does not have electricity.
translation.zh: 该岛的近一半区域仍然没有电力供应

translation.en: [reporter 2] The slow pace of recovery has lead hundreds of thousands of Puerto Ricans,
translation.zh: 缓慢的重建进程已迫使数十万

translation.en: who are American citizens, to relocate on the U.S. mainland.
translation.zh: 同为美国公民的波多黎各人 迁居美国大陆

translation.en: [reporter 3] Transitional shelter assistance
translation.zh: 过渡性住房援助将流离失所的

translation.en: provides hotel rooms for displaced Puerto Ricans to live in.
translation.zh: 过渡性住房援助将流离失所的 波多黎各人安置在宾馆客房

translation.en: And they've got until June 30th
translation.zh: 他们需要在6月30日联邦应急管理署

translation.en: before FEMA will finally discontinue the program.
translation.zh: 他们需要在6月30日联邦应急管理署 中断该项目前找到住所

translation.en: So they essentially will be homeless at the end of June.
translation.zh: 换句话说 他们将在六月底无家可归

translation.en: [Glenda in Spanish] Pretty! Look!
translation.zh: （但该署并未将同等待遇给予 飓风玛利亚的受灾者）

translation.en: And you haven't come to see me. That's why I didn't show you.
translation.zh: 你都没有来看我 所以我没有给你看

translation.en: Look at this one. You like the big ones. Look how cute this one is!
translation.zh: 看这个 你喜欢大的 看这个多好看！

translation.en: -And you haven't come to see me. -But I don't...
translation.zh: -你都不来看我 -可是我不…

translation.en: -I don't like silver. -This isn't silver. It's gold, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢银的 这不是银的 是金的 亲爱的

translation.en: Oh, are they bigger than these? The bigger, the better.
translation.zh: 哦 那副比我这副还大吗？越大越好

translation.en: Honey, these are the biggest ones there are.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 这副是最大的了

translation.en: If they are bigger than these, I'll buy them.
translation.zh: 如果那副比我这副大 我就买

translation.en: Where are you? At the park over there?
translation.zh: 你在哪？在那边的公园里吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Are there more people there I can sell to? I will sell these to everyone.
translation.zh: 那还有别的人会买吗？我能卖给大伙

translation.en: [Glenda] Oh, I've got this bracelet that matches your eyes!
translation.zh: 哦 我这有个镯子和你的眼睛很搭！

translation.en: [Glenda] Six months, here in this hotel.
translation.zh: 在这家宾馆六个月了

translation.en: ...for school tomorrow.
translation.zh: …明天上学要带的

translation.en: My husband and I share a room.
translation.zh: 我和我丈夫同住一间房

translation.en: Between four walls...
translation.zh: 四面都是墙壁…

translation.en: all I could do was look out at the road.
translation.zh: 我唯一能做的就是看外面的街道

translation.en: But, little by little, I began to leave the room.
translation.zh: 但渐渐地 我开始走出房门

translation.en: -[people cheering, clapping] -[all] Surprise!
translation.zh: 惊喜！

translation.en: -Come give me a hug. -You're going to spray me!
translation.zh: 快来抱一个 你会喷我的！

translation.en: Is there a stripper?
translation.zh: 有脱衣舞男吗？

translation.en: Is there a stripper?
translation.zh: 有脱衣舞男来吗？

translation.en: Give me a hug and a kiss.
translation.zh: 快来抱一下 亲一个

translation.en: [Glenda] I met her here at the hotel.
translation.zh: 我在宾馆结识了她

translation.en: They are like family to me.
translation.zh: 她们就像我的家人一样

translation.en: [Glenda] I am the crazy one in this friendship.
translation.zh: 我是这段友谊里疯狂的那一个

translation.en: Kenia is very spontaneous. She always does something that makes you laugh.
translation.zh: 柯妮亚非常随性奔放 总惹得你大笑

translation.en: Sheila is a bit more serious. She's like our anchor.
translation.zh: 西拉稍显严肃一些 她是我们的支柱

translation.en: -"Paint your hair yellow!" -[women squealing]
translation.zh: “把你的头发喷成黄色！”

translation.en: -Let me make a wish. -[woman 1] I wish to have an apartment.
translation.zh: 我来许个愿 -我想要一间公寓 -我想要一间五卧室公寓！

translation.en: [woman 2] I wish to have a five-bedroom apartment!
translation.zh: -我想要一间公寓 -我想要一间五卧室公寓！

translation.en: I wasn't just thinking about myself.
translation.zh: 我想的不仅是我自己

translation.en: -[woman 3] Come on, do it! -[woman 2] Five rooms for all of us.
translation.zh: 快点吹啦！ 给我们大家都来五间房

translation.en: [woman 3] The candles are moving.
translation.zh: 蜡烛在动

translation.en: -[woman 1] Move. -[woman 2] Do it!
translation.zh: -走开 -快点吹！

translation.en: -[woman 3] Just blow. What's with you? -[all chuckling]
translation.zh: 快点吹啦 你在干什么？

translation.en: -[woman 1] It's not your birthday. -I hope my wish comes true.
translation.zh: 又不是你过生日 希望我能愿望成真

translation.en: [automated voice in English] You have reached the Federal Emergency Management Agency.
translation.zh: 这里是联邦应急管理署

translation.en: [in Spanish] For people who only speak Spanish, say, "Spanish."
translation.zh: 只会讲西班牙语的人士请说：“西语”

translation.en: -Spanish. -[voice continues indistinctly, stops]
translation.zh: 西语

translation.en: [woman in Spanish] Good afternoon. How can I assist you?
translation.zh: 下午好 有什么可以帮助您？

translation.en: [Kenia] I want to verify when our hotel voucher is expiring, love.
translation.zh: 亲 我想确认我们宾馆券的失效日期

translation.en: Do we stay until June 30th and leave July 1st?
translation.zh: 我们待到6月30号 在7月1日离开吗？

translation.en: [woman] Allow me to verify so I can give you the right information.
translation.zh: 容我确认一下以便为您提供正确信息

translation.en: -No problem. Don't worry, I'll hold. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -好 没问题 我在线等着 -谢谢你

translation.en: I've always been nice to them because...
translation.zh: 我对他们一直很客气 因为…

translation.en: what's the point of taking it out on them?
translation.zh: 把气发泄在他们身上有什么用呢？

translation.en: My heart'd be like...
translation.zh: 我的内心是这样…

translation.en: And they'd be like, "Sure, ma'am. No problem."
translation.zh: 然后他们会说：“好的 女士 没问题”

translation.en: [woman] All right, ma'am. You should be leaving July 1st,
translation.zh: 好的 女士 您需要在7月1日离开

translation.en: but you should verify the check-out time with the hotel.
translation.zh: 但您应该和宾馆核实退房时间

translation.en: -The 30th, I sleep here. The 1st, I leave. -That's right.
translation.zh: -我30号在这里睡 然后1号离开 -没错

translation.en: -Right. -Okay. Are there any updates?
translation.zh: 正确 好 有什么新消息吗？

translation.en: That's the latest information. Can I help you with anything else?
translation.zh: 目前的最新信息就是这些 还有其他能帮您的吗？

translation.en: No. Thank you, love. That'd be all. You're so kind.
translation.zh: 没了 谢谢你 亲 就这样 你人真好

translation.en: Stay calm. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 保持冷静 不要担心

translation.en: They're the ones in charge.
translation.zh: 这事他们说了算

translation.en: Let's hope for a miracle.
translation.zh: 我们祈求奇迹发生吧

translation.en: [woman in English] The evacuee population that we work with,
translation.zh: 我们服务的被撤离人口…

translation.en: we've seen an ongoing hurricane, right?
translation.zh: 我们眼前是一场持续的飓风 对吧？

translation.en: On the island, a hurricane passed. It was devastating.
translation.zh: 在岛上 飓风过境 毁损惨重

translation.en: There were long-term consequences.
translation.zh: 后果是长期性的 对被撤离的人来说

translation.en: For the evacuees, that hurricane is being renewed every month
translation.zh: 后果是长期性的 对被撤离的人来说 那场飓风每月都在重演

translation.en: because they are living under perpetually precarious situations.
translation.zh: 因为他们生活在永久的颠沛流离之中

translation.en: They're trying to seek a job with a living wage,
translation.zh: 他们试着寻找薪资够维持生活的工作

translation.en: trying to get their children's needs met
translation.zh: 试着满足他们孩子的生活所需

translation.en: and healthcare issues met.
translation.zh: 并满足医疗方面的需求

translation.en: It's an ongoing survival mode.
translation.zh: 这是一种没有间歇的求生模式

translation.en: [in Spanish] There is an apartment for rent. We should ask.
translation.zh: 那里有个公寓招租 我们应该去问问

translation.en: -What? -It could be nice.
translation.zh: -什么？ -可能还不错

translation.en: -"For rent"? -Does it say?
translation.zh: -“招租”？ -是那么写的吗？

translation.en: Over there.
translation.zh: 在那边

translation.en: [announcement over PA] Please exit at the rear door.
translation.zh: 请从后门下车

translation.en: [Glenda] We got married on June 7th, 2017.
translation.zh: 我们在2017年6月7日成婚

translation.en: Four months before the hurricane.
translation.zh: 飓风袭来的四个月前

translation.en: I've had my highs and lows in love
translation.zh: 我的情路比较坎坷

translation.en: because I've had four partners before.
translation.zh: 因为我曾经交往过四个对象

translation.en: I asked God to bring a good man into my life, and he showed up.
translation.zh: 我祈求上天给我个好男人 他出现了

translation.en: And he opened my heart to love again.
translation.zh: 然后他使我敞开心扉 再次投入爱情

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: Ouch!
translation.zh: 好痛！

translation.en: [Glenda] After Hurricane Maria,
translation.zh: 飓风玛利亚来袭之后

translation.en: I sat down with my husband and told him we needed to leave.
translation.zh: 我找我丈夫好好谈了谈 说我们得走

translation.en: Life's not easy.
translation.zh: 人生不易啊

translation.en: I have tumors in my throat.
translation.zh: 我喉咙里有肿瘤

translation.en: The hospital system was down, there was no electricity,
translation.zh: 医院系统被中断了 没有电力供应

translation.en: and many doctors had left Puerto Rico.
translation.zh: 很多医生都离开了波多黎各

translation.en: [Glenda] This is the one you want, right?
translation.zh: 你想要的是这个 对吗？

translation.en: [woman on phone] Yes. I want a large.
translation.zh: 对！我想要大号

translation.en: Sounds good. I'll get it for you.
translation.zh: 好的 我给你拿

translation.en: These are Louis Vuitton.
translation.zh: 这些是路易威登的！

translation.en: If you take two, I'll sell both for $25.
translation.zh: 你买两件的话 我两件25美元卖给你

translation.en: [Glenda] My husband works at a parking lot.
translation.zh: 我丈夫在停车场工作

translation.en: So I'm trying to make extra money to help him out.
translation.zh: 所以我也努力赚些钱来补贴家用

translation.en: I try to be happy and cheerful.
translation.zh: 我试着让自己开心 保持乐观

translation.en: How can we make it in this city when it's so difficult to live here?
translation.zh: 这里生活如此艰辛 我们要如何在这座城市里立足呢？

translation.en: [Kenia] Look, Nilda Lee,
translation.zh: 听着 妮尔达李…

translation.en: you just have to stay calm when you're in school. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 你在学校只要保持冷静就行 别担心

translation.en: You aren't the one misbehaving.
translation.zh: 胡作非为的人不是你

translation.en: It's the other girls who are bullying you and stealing your cell phone.
translation.zh: 是其他女生欺负你 偷你手机

translation.en: You're very mature for being 11.
translation.zh: 以你11岁的年纪 你非常成熟

translation.en: I want you to look pretty and well put together.
translation.zh: 我想让你看起来漂漂亮亮、仪表端庄

translation.en: [Nilda] This is the first time I've been bullied.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次经历霸凌

translation.en: It didn't happen in Puerto Rico because I had a lot of friends there.
translation.zh: 在波多黎各没有过 因为我朋友很多

translation.en: [Nilda] They don't get along with me. I don't speak English,
translation.zh: 我和他们处不好 我不会说英文

translation.en: and I'm from another country. I am not from their country.
translation.zh: 我来自另一个国家 不是他们国家的

translation.en: They bully me and tell me stuff.
translation.zh: 他们欺负我 对我说不好听的话

translation.en: [Kenia] This is our stop.
translation.zh: 我们到站了

translation.en: Careful.
translation.zh: 当心

translation.en: She doesn't want to go to school.
translation.zh: 她不想去上学

translation.en: God, it's not easy.
translation.zh: 天啊 真是难办啊！

translation.en: I miss my island. Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 我想念岛上的日子了 绝对的

translation.en: [Kenia] We lived out in the country.
translation.zh: 我们以前住在乡下

translation.en: The air was natural, fresh.
translation.zh: 空气自然清新

translation.en: It was completely quiet.
translation.zh: 四周一片寂静

translation.en: Only the sound of roosters.
translation.zh: 只有鸡啼的声音

translation.en: I miss it.
translation.zh: 我想念那里

translation.en: I would bring the Puerto Rican flag with me, even to the moon.
translation.zh: 哪怕上月球 我也要带着波罗黎各的旗帜

translation.en: [Glenda] There are so many Puerto Ricans here in the Bronx...
translation.zh: 布朗克斯区有很多波多黎各人

translation.en: sometimes it feels like you're in Puerto Rico.
translation.zh: 有时我感觉我就在波多黎各一样

translation.en: [Kenia] You're walking, and the cars pass by,
translation.zh: 在街上走着的时候 有车驶过

translation.en: and you can hear salsa music.
translation.zh: 你可以听到里面放着萨尔萨舞曲

translation.en: You go, "Oh, look at that boricua with the music blasting!"
translation.zh: 你会想：“哦 瞧那大声放着音乐的波多黎各人！”

translation.en: [Kenia] It reminds you that even though you're in a strange land,
translation.zh: 这会让你想起 虽然你身处异地

translation.en: you're still on your island.
translation.zh: 你仍然在你熟悉的岛上

translation.en: [Glenda] Those are the shoes
translation.zh: 这些鞋子

translation.en: -for each person that died in Puerto Rico. -Yes.
translation.zh: 每一双代表一个在波多黎各罹难的人

translation.en: [reporter 1 in English] According to a new study,
translation.zh: 根据最新调查

translation.en: the death toll from Hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico
translation.zh: 飓风玛利亚在波多黎各所致死亡人数

translation.en: is more than 70 times higher than officials claim.
translation.zh: 是官方所称数据的70余倍

translation.en: [reporter 2] With a death toll of 4,645,
translation.zh: 飓风玛利亚造成4645人死亡

translation.en: Hurricane Maria would become the second deadliest hurricane in U.S. history.
translation.zh: 是美国历史上致死人数第二高的飓风

translation.en: If you look at a real catastrophe like Katrina,
translation.zh: 你看看飓风卡特里娜这样的真正大灾

translation.en: and you look at the tremendous hundreds and hundreds of people that died,
translation.zh: 看看死去的大量的成千上万的人

translation.en: you can be proud of all of your people, all of our people working together.
translation.zh: 你会为你们和我们的人协作感到骄傲

translation.en: [reporter 3] The governor is now highlighting the differences
translation.zh: 波多黎各总督突出对比了

translation.en: of the federal government's response to other hurricanes.
translation.zh: 联邦政府应对其他飓风时的不同反应

translation.en: My message to all political leaders...
translation.zh: 我想对所有政治领导人说…

translation.en: If they really, truly want to end inequality with Puerto Rico,
translation.zh: 如果他们真想终结波多黎各的不平等

translation.en: let's not only look at what happened in the past year, past couple of years in Puerto Rico.
translation.zh: 我们不能只看去年或近两年的情况

translation.en: Let's look at the long-standing history.
translation.zh: 而是要以长远的历史眼光看问题

translation.en: Puerto Rico is a colonial territory.
translation.zh: 波多黎各是一个殖民领地

translation.en: Puerto Rican-U.S. citizens are second-class U.S. citizens.
translation.zh: 波多黎各裔美国公民是美国二等公民

translation.en: We have the most populated colonial territory in the world,
translation.zh: 我们是世界上人口最多的殖民领地

translation.en: but we don't have the right to vote.
translation.zh: 但我们没有投票权

translation.en: My ask is very simple:
translation.zh: 我的诉求非常简单：

translation.en: Do you support eliminating colonial territories
translation.zh: 在21世纪的美国

translation.en: in the 21st century in the United States?
translation.zh: 你是否支持废除殖民领地？

translation.en: Do you support statehood for Puerto Rico?
translation.zh: 你是否支持波多黎各建州？

translation.en: All we're asking is to be treated equally.
translation.zh: 我们的唯一要求就是被平等对待

translation.en: [Glenda] The whole world is watching.
translation.zh: 全世界都在注视着

translation.en: They don't have the courage to face us and say, "This is what happened."
translation.zh: 他们没有勇气面对我们说： “事情是这样”

translation.en: -Trump came to throw paper towels... -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 特朗普到这里来向灾民扔厨房纸巾…

translation.en: ...for us to soak up our tears. You don't do that.
translation.zh: 让我们擦干眼泪 这不合情理

translation.en: [Trump] I think that Puerto Rico was an incredible unsung success.
translation.zh: 我认为波多黎各是被埋没的极大成功

translation.en: It was one of the best jobs that's ever been done,
translation.zh: 在这件事的相关问题上

translation.en: with respect to what this is all about.
translation.zh: 是有史以来做得最好的工作之一

translation.en: [Kenia] My father died one month after I got here...
translation.zh: 我父亲在我搬过来的一个月后去世…

translation.en: of natural causes.
translation.zh: 说是死于“自然原因”

translation.en: But they didn't say why.
translation.zh: 但他们没有说为什么

translation.en: It was due to lack of light, lack of hygiene.
translation.zh: 那是因为缺乏照明 缺乏卫生条件

translation.en: No water, no communication.
translation.zh: 没有水 没有通讯

translation.en: We got here in November, and he died in December,
translation.zh: 我们11月搬来这里 他12月就去世了

translation.en: and I couldn't go back to see him.
translation.zh: 我没法回去见他一面

translation.en: But I'm not going to cry.
translation.zh: 但我不会哭

translation.en: I need to stay strong in my heart to survive with my daughter.
translation.zh: 我要保持内心坚强 和我女儿活下去

translation.en: [woman in English] How can I help you?
translation.zh: 晚上好 有什么能帮您吗？

translation.en: [in English] You speak Spanish, please?
translation.zh: 请问您会说西语吗？

translation.en: [man in English] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [in Spanish] I'm calling to see if you have a two-bedroom apartment.
translation.zh: 我想问一下你们有没有两卧室的公寓

translation.en: [man in Spanish] I don't have any right now,
translation.zh: 现在没有 但如果你留下名字和电话

translation.en: but if you leave your name and number, I'll call you when one is available.
translation.zh: 现在没有 但如果你留下名字和电话 我会在有空房的时候打给你

translation.en: [recorded voice in English] Please leave a short, detailed message
translation.zh: 请录下简短详细的留言

translation.en: -so that we can get back to you. -[beeping]
translation.zh: 以供我们给您回电

translation.en: [automated voice] Sorry, there is no space for recording.
translation.zh: 抱歉 录音存储空间已满

translation.en: [Glenda in English] This is the real estate?
translation.zh: 是房屋中介吗？

translation.en: [man in English] Yes. Can I help you?
translation.zh: 是的 有什么能帮您的吗？

translation.en: You speak Spanish, please?
translation.zh: 请问您会说西语吗？

translation.en: No, I don't speak Spanish.
translation.zh: 我不会说西语

translation.en: Okay. You have the apartment for the two room?
translation.zh: 好吧 您有两个房间的公寓吗？

translation.en: -[man] No, um... -What?
translation.zh: -没有 呃… -什么？

translation.en: No. No, we don't.
translation.zh: 不 我们没有

translation.en: [reporter 1 in English] FEMA is ending assistance for Puerto Ricans
translation.zh: FEMA即将终止对波多黎各人的援助

translation.en: as many still struggle to recover after Hurricane Maria's devastating impact.
translation.zh: 很多仍未从飓风玛利亚的重创中恢复

translation.en: In a statement, FEMA said the program was, quote,
translation.zh: FEMA在声明中说：该项目是

translation.en: "A temporary solution that bridges survivors into more permanent options."
translation.zh: “使幸存者过渡到更永久选项的 临时解决方案”

translation.en: Permanent options tough to find in the tight rental market.
translation.zh: 永久选项在紧缩的租房市场很难找到

translation.en: Hurricane Maria survivors have to find their own place to live
translation.zh: 飓风玛利亚幸存者需要自行找到住所

translation.en: or receive a one-way plane ticket back to Puerto Rico.
translation.zh: 否则就将领取单程票飞回波多黎各

translation.en: [Glenda in Spanish] FEMA is letting us go.
translation.zh: FEMA在赶我们走

translation.en: We don't have the resources to be able to move forward
translation.zh: 在离开宾馆之后

translation.en: after we leave the hotel.
translation.zh: 我们没有资源继续生活

translation.en: [Natasha] It's unfortunate to say that there really has been no improvement in Puerto Rico.
translation.zh: 遗憾的是 波多黎各的情况毫无改善

translation.en: I think if you go there, you may see,
translation.zh: 如果你去到那里 你可能会看到

translation.en: oh, there are some lights back on, there's street lamps up,
translation.zh: 哦 有电灯已经恢复供电了 街灯亮了

translation.en: some of the roads have been repaired. Those are really superficial.
translation.zh: 一些道路被修复了 但这些非常表面

translation.en: When you see the closure of hundreds of public schools,
translation.zh: 你还应看到数百间公立学校被关闭

translation.en: the cuts to the public university system, the closure of health care clinics
translation.zh: 公立大学系统资金被削减 医疗诊所和医院的部分翼楼被关闭

translation.en: and parts of hospital wings.
translation.zh: 医疗诊所和医院的部分翼楼被关闭

translation.en: FEMA was offering just a one-way ticket back to something.
translation.zh: FEMA提供的是回到某个地方的单程票

translation.en: It didn't include a home, didn't include long-term housing.
translation.zh: 并不包括一个家 也不包括长期住房

translation.en: [woman in Spanish] Hello, Sheila. We invaded the room.
translation.zh: 喂 西拉 我们攻占了宾馆房间

translation.en: [Glenda] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [woman in Spanish] Hi. How are you?
translation.zh: 喂 你好吗？

translation.en: [Glenda] Good and how are you?
translation.zh: 不错 你呢？

translation.en: Good. Honestly, I'm gonna tell you...
translation.zh: 我也很好 不瞒你说 我会告诉你…

translation.en: I'll tell you what they are talking about. Please don't get your hopes up.
translation.zh: 告诉你他们的说法 请别抱太大希望

translation.en: -This whole thing is upsetting me. -Okay.
translation.zh: 这整件事都很让我恼火 好

translation.en: To be honest,
translation.zh: 说实话

translation.en: a solution by this weekend would be a miracle
translation.zh: 如果能在周末前解决 那将是个奇迹

translation.en: because it's so last-minute.
translation.zh: 因为时间所剩无几

translation.en: I think the city is trying to pressure people.
translation.zh: 我认为市上想要给灾民施压…

translation.en: Pressuring them to go to homeless shelters.
translation.zh: 给他们施压 让他们去流浪者收容所

translation.en: Since a lot of people don't want to go, they'll instead go back to Puerto Rico.
translation.zh: 因为很多人不想去 而要回波多黎各

translation.en: That's the strategy I'm seeing.
translation.zh: 这是我目前看到的策略

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 这样啊…

translation.en: [boy] So let's go to another hotel.
translation.zh: 那我们去别的宾馆

translation.en: [Glenda] To another hotel, but it's going to be for people that are homeless.
translation.zh: 去别的宾馆 但那是给无家可归者的

translation.en: [woman in Spanish] They have the resources to do something.
translation.zh: 他们有资源做点什么

translation.en: The thing is that they want most of us to leave the country.
translation.zh: 关键在于 他们想让我们大部分人离开这个国家

translation.en: We just have to keep living day by day and wait.
translation.zh: 我们只能一天天熬着、等待着

translation.en: -[Glenda] Exactly. -Strong together.
translation.zh: -没错 -团结就是力量

translation.en: [woman] Right. We can't break down because we went through worse in Puerto Rico.
translation.zh: 对 我们不能垮掉 因为我们在波多黎各经历过更糟的事

translation.en: How long were we without water and electricity in Puerto Rico?
translation.zh: 我们在波多黎各时有多久没水没电？

translation.en: -[Nilda] With no food. -Here, we have water and electricity.
translation.zh: -还没有食物 -在这里我们有水有电

translation.en: Where will we be? We don't know. We just have to wait.
translation.zh: 我们何去何从？不知道 我们只能等

translation.en: -[Kenia] God will provide. -[Nilda] I wish I was you.
translation.zh: -上帝会赐予的 -真希望我能像你这样

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Exactly.
translation.zh: 说得对

translation.en: It's a slow process.
translation.zh: 这是个漫长的过程

translation.en: One day at a time.
translation.zh: 过一天算一天

translation.en: -[Kenia] How many more days? -Four.
translation.zh: 还有多少天？ 四天

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Kenia] We need ice.
translation.zh: 我们需要冰块

translation.en: Nilda, can you get more ice?
translation.zh: 妮尔达 你能去拿点冰块吗？

translation.en: She gets stuck on the phone. I should take it away.
translation.zh: 她就知道看手机 我应该没收了它

translation.en: I live alone here. No one listens to me.
translation.zh: 我一个人住这 没人听我说话是吧？

translation.en: Nilda Lee, answer me.
translation.zh: 妮尔达李 回答我

translation.en: -Oh, Lord. -What?
translation.zh: -老天爷啊 -干嘛？

translation.en: There you are! [exclaiming]
translation.zh: 你在这呢！

translation.en: You're here! Great!
translation.zh: 你来啦！真好！

translation.en: I'm happy you're here!
translation.zh: 你在这里我真开心！

translation.en: What time did you get here?
translation.zh: 你什么时候回来的？

translation.en: -[chuckling] -I was never gone.
translation.zh: 我根本没出去

translation.en: [Glenda] What did you hear? What did the doctor say?
translation.zh: 你听到些什么？医生怎么说？

translation.en: What did he notice about her?
translation.zh: 他对她做了哪些观察？

translation.en: [Kenia] The doctor noticed that what she went through with the hurricane
translation.zh: 医生注意到 她在飓风期间的经历影响了她的情绪

translation.en: has affected her emotionally.
translation.zh: 她在飓风期间的经历影响了她的情绪

translation.en: That those memories aren't going to fade
translation.zh: 那些记忆不会消退

translation.en: -until she has stability and security. -[door unlocks, opens]
translation.zh: 直到她获得一些稳定和安全感

translation.en: -Yes. Hi, Nilda Lee. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 嗨 妮尔达李

translation.en: Tell me how it went.
translation.zh: 告诉我情况…

translation.en: Come here so I can talk to you.
translation.zh: 过来点 方便我和你说话

translation.en: -How did it go? How was it? -[Kenia speaks indistinctly]
translation.zh: 怎么样？情况如何？ 你给我说说 情况如何？

translation.en: [Glenda] You tell me. How did it go?
translation.zh: 你给我说说 情况如何？

translation.en: -Where? -[Glenda] The psychologist's.
translation.zh: -哪里的情况？ -看心理医生的情况

translation.en: -[laughs] -I told him that I was in my house the day of the hurricane.
translation.zh: 我告诉他 飓风来临的那天我在家

translation.en: I was young. I thought it was coming to kill me.
translation.zh: 我当时还小 以为飓风会要了我的命

translation.en: I also told him
translation.zh: 我还告诉他…

translation.en: I've been clenching my fists. I sometimes pull my hair.
translation.zh: 我总会捏紧拳头 有时会扯我的头发

translation.en: I hide in the bathroom.
translation.zh: 我会躲在洗手间里

translation.en: Sometimes I drive myself a little crazy.
translation.zh: 有时候我会有点发狂的状态

translation.en: I have told you that I want to help you
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 我想要帮你

translation.en: because you're like a daughter to me.
translation.zh: 因为我把你当女儿看待

translation.en: Kenia is like a sister to me.
translation.zh: 柯妮亚与我情同姐妹

translation.en: I want to help you because when I see you
translation.zh: 我想帮你 因为我看着你…

translation.en: acting like that, pulling your hair, throwing your fists,
translation.zh: 做那些事 像抓头发、捏拳头

translation.en: or saying you're ugly and that you have no friends--
translation.zh: 或者说自己丑 说你没朋友…

translation.en: Try this instead...
translation.zh: 试试这样做

translation.en: Breathe, calm down, and go on about your day.
translation.zh: 呼吸 冷静 然后继续你一天的生活

translation.en: See yourself as you really are.
translation.zh: 看见你真实的自己

translation.en: You are a very pretty girl who is just starting to live.
translation.zh: 你是个很漂亮的姑娘 人生才刚开始

translation.en: You have to say, "I am beautiful, and I'm going to conquer the world."
translation.zh: 你得说：“我很美 我要征服全世界”

translation.en: Keep pushing forward, and you are going to find not just one,
translation.zh: 努力向前进 你会交到不仅一个朋友

translation.en: but millions of friends.
translation.zh: 而是会交到无数个朋友

translation.en: [Glenda] We have three days left, and I'm in a bit of a panic.
translation.zh: 我们只剩三天了 我有点焦虑不安

translation.en: I don't know if we'll get the assistance
translation.zh: 我不知道我们能否得到援助

translation.en: we need to get a roof over our heads, or if we'll be out on the street.
translation.zh: 够我们找个地方住 还是会露宿街头

translation.en: The one thing I know is that we'll be separated.
translation.zh: 我唯一确定的是我们会分开

translation.en: We won't be together anymore.
translation.zh: 我们不会再在一起了

translation.en: [Nilda squeals] No! Come here!
translation.zh: 不要！过来！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: [all] Happy Birthday!
translation.zh: 惊喜！

translation.en: It's from all of us! She's going to cry.
translation.zh: 这是我们大家的意思！她要哭了

translation.en: Come on, Nilda Lee!
translation.zh: 别哭了 妮尔达李

translation.en: This was not our idea.
translation.zh: 这不是我们的点子

translation.en: We had a different idea.
translation.zh: 我们本来想的是另一个点子

translation.en: [reporter 1] Hurricane housing for the victims of Hurricane Maria is over.
translation.zh: 飓风玛利亚受灾者的住房援助终止

translation.en: As of today, most affected families will lose their hotel and motel vouchers
translation.zh: 从今日起 大多数受灾家庭会失去 宾馆和汽车旅馆的入住券

translation.en: and have to find another place to live.
translation.zh: 必须另找住处

translation.en: Do you want to take these to storage?
translation.zh: 这些要放去储存仓库吗？

translation.en: Nilda?
translation.zh: 妮尔达？

translation.en: -How many bags do you need? -[Kenia] About four.
translation.zh: -你要几个袋子？ -四个左右

translation.en: Four bags. The big ones.
translation.zh: 四个袋子 大袋子

translation.en: [woman] Discard everything.
translation.zh: 所有东西都扔掉

translation.en: I want to give these to you
translation.zh: 我想把这些给你

translation.en: because I have to move.
translation.zh: 因为我要搬走了

translation.en: -[woman] I'll take them. -You will?
translation.zh: -我收下 -真的？

translation.en: Calm down. This is a process. It's hard, but...
translation.zh: 冷静 这是一个过程 很艰辛… 但是…

translation.en: we'll see each other soon.
translation.zh: 我们会很快见面的

translation.en: [woman in English] What's her name?
translation.zh: 她叫什么名字？

translation.en: -[in Spanish] My name is Sheila Moreno. -Sheila.
translation.zh: -我的名字叫西拉莫雷诺 -西拉

translation.en: -[Shelia] My husband. -[woman] Alvarez. It's him?
translation.zh: -我丈夫 -阿尔瓦雷茨 是他吗？

translation.en: [Sheila] Alvarez, my husband. He's right there.
translation.zh: 阿尔瓦雷茨 我丈夫 他就在那边

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: [woman 1 in English] Ask them what day did they arrive in New York City.
translation.zh: 好 问他们是什么时候来纽约市的

translation.en: [woman 2 in Spanish] When did you arrive to the U.S.?
translation.zh: 你们什么时候来的美国？

translation.en: -[Sheila in Spanish] December 24. -[woman 2 in English] December 24.
[Sheila] We came to the intake office, and they told us that FEMA would help us.
translation.zh: 我们去了受理处 他们说FEMA会帮我们

translation.en: [woman 2 in Spanish] Did FEMA cover your moving expenses?
translation.zh: FEMA有承担你们的搬迁费用吗？

translation.en: [Sheila] No, FEMA didn't cover our costs to move here.
translation.zh: 没有 FEMA没有承担我们搬来的费用

translation.en: Those people aren't helping at all, Kenia.
translation.zh: 那些人一点忙也没帮 柯妮亚

translation.en: [Sheila] No, FEMA didn't cover any travel fare money...
translation.zh: 不 FEMA没有承担任何旅行费用

translation.en: They aren't doing anything. They don't help with anything.
translation.zh: 他们什么都没做 什么事都不帮忙

translation.en: [woman 1 in English] Do they understand why they're being transferred?
translation.zh: 问一下他们是否知道被转移的原因

translation.en: [woman 2] She says no.
translation.zh: 她说不知道

translation.en: [woman 1] Okay. So tell her the reason why she's being moved
translation.zh: 好 是这样 告诉她被搬迁的原因

translation.en: is because the government is not paying for her family to stay here anymore.
translation.zh: 是政府不再承担她家人住这里的费用

translation.en: For none of the families.
translation.zh: 所有家庭都不再承担

translation.en: So tell her that she's going to go stay at a shelter.
translation.zh: 那你告诉她 她会住在收容所中

translation.en: We don't know how long she's going to be there.
translation.zh: 我们不知道她会在那待多久

translation.en: [Kenia] What are they thinking? Are they going to just leave people out on the streets?
translation.zh: 他们想干嘛？就这样让人露宿街头？

translation.en: [woman in English] Excuse me. Excuse me. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: [Kenia] These people don't have a place to stay.
translation.zh: 这些人没有地方住

translation.en: [woman 3] Glenda Martez?
translation.zh: 格伦达马特兹？

translation.en: [woman 3 in Spanish] Do you have any family you could stay with for a while?
translation.zh: 你有任何亲属可以暂时收留你吗？

translation.en: Try to think of where you can go.
translation.zh: 试着想想你能去哪住

translation.en: [Glenda] My son lives in Orlando in a small room with my mom and dad.
translation.zh: 我儿子和爸妈住在奥兰多的小房间里

translation.en: [crying] I can't go there.
translation.zh: 我不能去那里

translation.en: What about my husband's job? Are they giving him a job in Orlando?
translation.zh: 你丈夫的单位呢？ 会给他在奥兰多提供工作吗？

translation.en: [Sheila] They haven't explained anything to her.
translation.zh: 他们什么事都没给她解释清楚

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你要去哪？

translation.en: She said, "You have family in Orlando?" "My son is there."
translation.zh: 她说：“你有亲属在奥兰多吗？” 我儿子在那

translation.en: "Then go to Orlando." I can't.
translation.zh: “那就去奥兰多吧” 我不能去

translation.en: Christian lives in a studio. He took in my mom and dad who are sick.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂安在一间单人房里住 把我生病的父母接了过去

translation.en: [Sheila] Try to talk to them when they finish with Kenia.
translation.zh: 等他们和柯妮亚谈完后去找他们说说

translation.en: They'll explain everything to you,
translation.zh: 他们会把一切解释给你听 但是…

translation.en: but I have to leave now. Yes, I'll go.
translation.zh: 我得走了…对 我要走了

translation.en: I need to go because otherwise...
translation.zh: 我得走了 因为不然的话…

translation.en: -It's okay-- -Remember that this is only today.
translation.zh: 记住 就今天一天而已

translation.en: Because she is saying that she will find you some help.
translation.zh: 因为她说了她会找人帮助你

translation.en: Don't cry because that's what they want. To destabilize us so that we take off.
translation.zh: 别哭了 因为这正是他们想要的 扰乱我们 让我们离开

translation.en: -And that's not the case, okay? -Okay.
translation.zh: 我们不会让他们如愿 好吗？ 好

translation.en: Eh... [murmurs softly]
translation.zh: （柯妮亚的兄弟）

translation.en: -This is what's left. -Yes, I know.
translation.zh: 剩下的就是这个了 我知道

translation.en: Tranquilo.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: [brother] Nothing but dust.
translation.zh: 就剩一抔灰了

translation.en: First Hurricane Maria...
translation.zh: 先是飓风玛利亚…

translation.en: and then this ordeal.
translation.zh: 然后又是这段磨难

translation.en: [Kenia] I miss him, like I miss Mom.
translation.zh: 我想他 就像我想念妈妈一样

translation.en: I miss him looking after me and my daughter.
translation.zh: 我想念有他照顾我和我女儿

translation.en: I feel so lonely.
translation.zh: 我觉得好孤单

translation.en: [Kenia] It's not that they just died. They let them die.
translation.zh: 他们不是“就那么死了” 而是他们让他们死了

translation.en: And hurricane season is coming again.
translation.zh: 飓风季节又要来临了
